eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Dodge, WI; AT 04:08 PM ON NOV 15, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:44 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Urgent Dodge County alert: Update on missing 3 year old from Beaver Dam WI. He has been found, located safe. No need to continue looking for child.
